games.title: Soccer Dash
games.description:
Soccer Dash is a soccer game in which you swipe a soccer ball through obstacles and soccer players and hit the ball to score a goal.

You have drag controls, drag to choose the direction of the kick, and release to hit the ball. During the dragging process, the game goes into a slow motion state, so you can take your time to choose the direction of the kick.
games.howToPlayText:
The goal of the game is to bypass all the traps and score a goal.
Control - swipe the ball. Change the direction of the kick and release to launch the ball.

games.title: Idle Pong
games.description: Idle Pong is a fun and satisfying idle clicker game where every tap launches a high-speed pong ball to smash through colorful obstacles! Watch the chaos unfold as your pong bounces, breaks, and earns you XP even while you're idle.
games.howToPlayText:
Click or tap to buy and spawn pong balls

Click and drag on the UI to scroll up and down

Upgrade your power, unlock unique pong balls with exciting effects, and push through challenging stages as you chase the next big combo. Whether you're actively tapping or just watching the pongs go wild, there's always something satisfying to see.

games.title: Pool 8
games.description:
Pool 8 is a brain-teasing puzzle game based on a Pool board. 
Pot the balls in the correct order to move through a series of increasingly difficult challenges!

There's a multitude of difficulty levels that you naturally progress through, starting with the easiest "rookie" level. At the end of each difficulty level, you get a chance to win extra retries in the "smash the candies" bonus round. You can also earn these by watching a short video ad.
Yes, but it starts out easy. As you progress, you reach higher difficulty levels.
games.howToPlayText:
The unique mechanics in this game mean you can only move up, down, left, and right. 
There are no diagonal movements, which poses a tricky challenge when several balls are on the table. 
The key to winning the level is to think about the order of each move to ensure you can line up all the shots successfully.

games.title: Smash & Merge Balls
games.description:
Short Description: A skill-based arcade game with colorful physics.

Full Description: In this game, you control a character that starts a fusion chain reaction! 
Strike the colorful balls to get them moving. 
The key rule: when two balls of the same color collide, they merge, and you earn points. 
Create massive chains of mergers to maximize your high score!


(lore)
(from the Showman):
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! Welcome to the greatest show in the cosmos — the Arena of Fusion!

Here is your instrument of chaos — the mighty merger mallet! Don't be shy, give it a swing! 
Your mission is brilliantly simple: step onto the arena floor and prepare for a rainbow deluge! 
Smash those colorful spheres, make them crash, and when two of the same color meet — 
BOOM! — they fuse into a glorious explosion of points!
games.howToPlayText:
-Use the "WASD" or the "touchscreen joystick" to move
-Use the "Space" or the "touch-screen button" to dash
-Use "left mouse button" or "Touch screen button" to Hit
-Hit the balls and collide the balls of the same color to score points, 
when they collide they create another ball of random color.

games.title: Hit & Knock Down
games.description:
Hit & Knock Down is a casual arcade-style shooting/throwing game where you aim to hit targets using various balls. When you successfully hit a target, it will either be knocked down or explode.
The goal is to clear each stage by obtaining the required score (or meeting stage objectives) and then move on to the next challenge.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag or swipe on the screen to aim the ball toward a target. (Typical of these types of games — though the store page doesn’t detail exact controls, it says “simple control.”)
Release your touch (or tap, depending on control scheme) to throw the ball toward the designated target.
If your throw strikes the target (a can, dish, fruit, or object), it will either fall or explode. You earn points for successful hits.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/hit--knock-down?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: School Of Basketball
games.description: It is the basketball arcade game in which you must try to score baskets in all the different game modes available. A basketball school opens its doors for enthusiasts like you. Do you know where to aim the ball so that you always hit the basket? Do you know any secret strategies? You have a limited number of balls and every time you miss, you also miss one ball. However, if you never miss, on the contrary, sometimes the ball will be added. How many points will you score?
games.howToPlayText:
Touch and drug anywhere on screen to throw a ball!
You can play either arcade, time attack, and distance mode. Arcade mode gives you 10 balls to use; you must continue to score baskets although it becomes harder each time you score.
Time attack mode requires you to score as many baskets within the time limit as possible; you have unlimited balls but limited time. 
Distance mode allows you to increase the distance of your shot each time that you score. The distance decreases every time you miss a shot, don’t let the distance reach zero; otherwise, it is game over.

games.title: Red Hide Ball
games.description:
Passionate about brain teasers? Want to challenge your logical skills? Then take a look at Hide Ball a logic puzzle game in which you should hide good balls from dreadful and harmful monsters.
Red Hide Ball is an amusing logic game that will test your IQ and raise your intellectual abilities to a new level. Plan every step, estimate a possible outcome and build tactical strategies. Solve logical puzzles, pass lots of interesting levels and win the game!
games.howToPlayText:
A puzzle board is presented with a configuration of balls, blockers, pathways, and monsters.
You tap or swipe objects often dragging or tapping using the minimal necessary moves.
Hide “good” balls by positioning them behind safe zones or behind obstacles.
Predict monster movements or blocked paths so the good ball isn’t captured.
Once the good ball is secure or the goal for the level is achieved, you move on to the next puzzle.

games.title: Tower Colour Crash
games.description:
Crash the Tower! Only the best crashers will be able to destroy all
towers in this 3D physics game. Try to let all towers collapse with
the amount of given balls. But you will only destroy the shapes
with the same colour as you ball. Use the powerful earthquake or
shotgun power ups, to create huge chain reactions, which will
lead into the towers destruction. Beautiful designed levels and
shapes will await you, so don’t waste any second and become
the greatest tower crasher of ‘em all!
games.howToPlayText:
- Start each level by choosing the right angle to hit the tower, swipe right or left.
- Throw the Ball on Blocks of the matching colour to destroy it!
- Make the Tower collapse!

games.title: Bucket Ball
games.description: Welcome to the Bucket Ball Game! 🎉 Tap the gate to open it and start the fun. Move obstacles out of the way or use them cleverly to guide the ball into the bucket. You'll get different items to help you complete each level. Remember, as you go higher, the game gets tougher, so think before you move! Each time you finish a level, you earn 1 point and move on to a more challenging one. How many levels can you play? Press on and challenge yourself! Just click your mouse to play. Enjoy the game! 🎮
games.howToPlayText:
Use the tools given to you to solve each level. As you progress, the game becomes harder, so use your wits!

Why is Glass Pong the most fun aim and shoot casual game?
Super fun and gets you hooked
Simple to start but a tough nut to crack
Offers many unique and challenging levels
Free to play, so jump right in!

games.title: Stack Ball 3D
games.description: Break through countless platforms with the ball, but avoid hitting black spots or you'll lose. Try to hit as many platforms as you can to gain speedboost and become unstoppable
games.howToPlayText: Controls: tap the phone screen, or press the left mouse button to make the ball start advancing downwards.

games.title: Mini Golf Battle
games.description:
Mini Golf Battle is a fun and casual mini golf challenge where your goal is simple: hit the ball into the hole with as few shots as possible. The game combines easy controls with tricky levels full of slopes, angles, and obstacles that test your timing and precision.
Each level is designed to get a little harder, so you’ll need to aim carefully, control your shot power, and plan the best path to sink the ball. It’s a relaxing yet addictive golf experience made for quick play sessions.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag/swipe in the direction you want the ball to move.
Pull back and release to adjust the strength of your shot.
The longer you drag, the stronger the hit.
Try to sink the ball into the hole in the fewest strokes possible.
Watch out for walls, ramps, and barriers that can deflect your ball.
Use angles to bounce around corners smartly.

Fire Power:
This bonus gives your ball a flaming speed boost.
It’s useful for long straight shots or when you want to quickly cross a large gap.
Best used when you need maximum distance in a single strike.

Wing / Glide Power:
This bonus allows your ball to glide smoothly as if it has wings.
It reduces friction and gives your ball a longer travel path with better control.
Ideal for precision shots where you want distance but also don’t want to overshoot too wildly.

Spring / Bounce Power:
This bonus acts like a spring-loaded push.
It helps your ball bounce forward with extra force, perfect for overcoming obstacles or making tricky jumps.
Best for courses with barriers, ramps, or platforms where normal shots can’t reach.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/mini-golf-battle?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Bricks Balls Breaker
games.description:
Bricks Balls Breaker is a addictive and challenging brick game.
Just play it to relax your brain. Be focus on breaking bricks and you will find it more funny and exciting.
Play and relax your brain. Focus on breaking bricks and you will find it more funny and exciting.
Swipe, aim, and shoot to break bricks and overcome thrilling puzzles. Smash as many bricks as possible in a single shot to earn stars, gems, and power-ups. With no time limits, you can enjoy this relaxing yet challenging game anywhere, anytime!
games.howToPlayText:
- Hold the screen with your finger and move to aim.
- Find best positions and angles to hit all bricks.
- When the durability of brick reaches 0, destroyed.
- Never let bricks reach the bottom or game is over.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/bricks-balls-breaker?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Draw & Drop
games.description: Dive into the thrilling universe of Draw & Drop, where creativity and skill collide! Navigate the ball into a basket by sketching your route, while overcoming tricky obstacles. Test your ingenuity through various levels, available for free on both mobile and desktop. Enjoy the challenge!
games.howToPlayText:
-Draw a line where you can direct the ball to the goal

-Click on the ball or the "start" icon in the Top Right to start

-The ball will move along the line you drew.

-The level passes when the ball hits the Target.

games.title: Ball: Path Through Obstacles
games.description: Roll through an obstacle course playing as a ball. Avoid traps and collect coins to unlock new skins
games.howToPlayText:
The game controls depend on the device you are playing on.

On PC:
Use the WASD keys to control the ball.

W (up) — moving forward.
A (left) — turn left.
S (down) is a backward movement.
D (right) — turn to the right.
The space bar is a jump.
To use the improvements, click on the improvement icon on the left side of the screen.
To buy a skin, click on the store icon in the menu.

On a smartphone/tablet:
On touch devices, control is performed using a virtual joystick located in the lower left part of the screen. Move your finger across the screen to control the movement of the ball.
To jump, click on the button in the lower right part of the screen.
To use the improvements, click on the improvement icon on the left side of the screen.
To buy a skin, click on the store icon in the menu.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/ball-path-through-obstacles?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Ball Attack
games.description: Blast through endless waves of bouncing balls, dodge incoming obstacles, and upgrade your powerful cannon to survive longer in this intense, fast-paced arcade shooter filled with nonstop action and explosive fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag to Move: Slide your finger (or mouse) left and right to control the cannon.
Shoot Automatically: Your cannon fires continuously—focus on aiming and dodging!
Destroy Balls: Each ball has a number—shoot to reduce it to zero and blast it apart.
Dodge Everything: Avoid touching balls or it’s game over!
Collect Coins: Use coins to upgrade your firepower, speed, and special abilities.
Survive Waves: The longer you last, the tougher (and more rewarding) it gets!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/ball-attack?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: StickerBall
games.description:
Stickerball is a fast-paced game where you collect stickers using a ball with unique abilities! Your goal is to collect 180 colorful stickers across 9 levels by completing challenges and activating triggers that change the game’s rules. Each turn, 10 stickers fly onto the field from a purchased pack, but any uncollected ones disappear—act quickly and precisely!

The game shines with 14 dynamic triggers: freeze stickers, double rewards with "x2," turn the ball into a magnet or ghost, activate "disco" mode, or control a dual ball! The more stickers you collect in one turn, the higher your combo and the more coins you earn. Holo-stickers, with their unique designs, grant double the currency!

Play across 12 vibrant, randomly changing fields. Buy sticker packs, upgrade your collection, and strategize by activating triggers at the perfect moment to maximize rewards.
games.howToPlayText:
How to play:
1. Aiming:
Move your cursor to aim-the arrow on the ball shows the strike direction.

2. Power Charging:
Hold LMB to fill the arrow’s power gauge. Release to launch the ball! Striking too early cancels the shot.

3. Collecting Stickers:
After striking, the ball bounces off walls, collecting stickers, coins, and crystals. The more you gather in one turn, the higher your combo and bonuses!

4. Triggers:
Collect special icons (magnet, x2, freeze, etc.) to power up the ball or alter sticker behavior. For example, "Ghost" lets the ball pass through triggers, while "Double Move" grants a second strike without new stickers appearing.

5. Buying Packs:
Before your first turn, choose a free Level 1 pack. Each pack contains 100 stickers, with 10 appearing per turn.

6. Strategy Tips:
Use "Freeze" or "Bonus" to increase the number of stickers on the field.
Combine triggers like "Magnet" + "x2" for double rewards.
Prioritize Holo-stickers - they grant x2 coins!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/stickerball?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Rolling Balls 3D
games.description: Rolling Balls 3D is a casual game in which you have to test your reaction and dexterity. The goal of the game is to guide the ball through an endless maze of obstacles, collecting balls along the way to get more! The bottom line is that every time you collect a ball, a clone of your ball is created and added to the maze, increasing the difficulty as you progress!
games.howToPlayText:
Swipe your finger or mouse to move the balls from side to side and avoid obstacles.

Collect a lot of balls and reach the finish line to complete the level.

games.title: Balls: Ricochet!
games.description:
Balls: Ricochet! - an arcade shooting game. The project pays tribute to the memory of old retro gaming. If you consider yourself a true connoisseur of games, you should play this game and immerse yourself in nostalgia. The game will delight you:
-Authentic gameplay
-Correct ball physics
-Good visual design
The exciting, addictive gameplay will immerse you in the pursuit of the best score for a long time. The concept, developed in the early 80s, still works perfectly. Start playing and beat your friend's score! 
Also pay attention to the following parts of the "Balls", have a nice game!
games.howToPlayText: Your task in the game is to set the direction of the ball. The ball destroys blocks using the environment of the level, you can set the direction of the ball so that it ricochets off the walls and blocks, so in one shot you can knock out several blocks at once.

games.title: Cannon Strike
games.description:
Welcome to the fun world of Cannon Strike, an arcade game where you shoot balls from a cannon! It's very easy to play.
So, are you ready to aim and fire? Download Cannon Strike Ball now and start playing! Challenge yourself to see how many levels you can pass! 
Get the game today and have a blast shooting cannonballs!
games.howToPlayText:
To finish a level, you need to fill all the buckets with balls. 🪣
Drop the right number of balls into each bucket to move to the next level. Watch out for moving obstacles that can block your shots!
In Cannon Strike, aim and shoot as many cannonballs as you can into the basket. It's a game that tests your aiming skills with a bit of physics fun!

games.title: Ball Bounce: Try It
games.description: Ball Bounce is a casual game that is very fun and challenging. Your task is to guide the ball which continues to bounce towards the portal while passing through obstacles
games.howToPlayText:
Ball Bounce is a casual game that is very fun and challenging. Your task is to guide the ball which continues to bounce towards the portal while passing through obstacles.
Desktop Controls:
← (Left Arrow): Move left.
→ (Right Arrow): Move right.
Mobile Controls:
press Screen right: Move left.
press Screen left: Move right.

games.title: TENKYU BALL
games.description: TENKYU BALL is a 3D casual ball-rolling puzzle game where you must guide a ball through tilting stages to reach the goal. The environment is minimalistic, and the challenge comes from balancing control vs risk. As you tilt the stage more, the ball moves faster, but there’s danger: if you tilt too much, the ball may fall off and you'll fail the level.
games.howToPlayText:
Tilt the stage / swipe finger:
You swipe (or drag) on your screen to tilt the surface on which the ball rests.
The tilt direction determines where the ball rolls.
Control carefully:
If you tilt too much, the ball gains speed and can fall off the edge.
Tilt only as much as needed to navigate turns, avoid gaps, and make tricky maneuvers.
Reach the goal:
Each stage has a goal point or exit you must reach. Successfully get the ball there without falling off.
Failure and retry:
If the ball falls, the level ends (you lose) and you’ll need to restart that stage.
